verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--'haridāsa, kaha samācāra'
haridāsa kahe,--'prabhu, ye kṛpā tomāra'

synonyms: prabhu kahe—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; haridāsa—My dear Haridāsa; kaha samācāra—what is the news; haridāsa kahe—Haridāsa replied; prabhu—my Lord; ye—whatever; kṛpā—mercy; tomāra—Your.
translation: Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu inquired, "My dear Haridāsa, what is the news?" Haridāsa Ṭhākura replied, "My Lord, whatever mercy You can bestow upon me."
